name: FallsScreening
title: Falls Screening
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for assessments using a falls screening tool.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an assessment for fall risk.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent an assessment for falls for children.)

concept.display: Falls in the past year [CMS Assessment]
Standardized fall risk assessment was conducted [CMS Assessment]
History of falling; immediate or within 3 months [Morse Fall Scale]
